content.rendered:
Directed by Jack Bender. Brad Turner. Jennifer Liao. Jeff Renfroe.

Written by John Griffin. John Griffin. Javier Grillo-Marxuach. Vivian Lee. Vivian Lee.

Cast  Harold Perrineau( Boyd Stevens 1) . Catalina Sandino Moreno( Tabitha Matthews 1) . Eion Bailey( Jim Matthews 1) . David Alpay( Jade 1) . Elizabeth Saunders( Donna 1) . Ricky He( Kenny 1) . Chloe Van Landschoot( Kristi 1) . Pegah Ghafoori( Fatima 1) . Corteon Moore( Ellis 1) . Hannah Cheramy( Julie Matthews 1) . Simon Webster( Ethan Matthews 1) . Avery Konrad( Sara Myers 1) . Elizabeth Moy( Tian Chen Liu 1) . Shaun Majumder( Father Khatri ) .Kaelen Ohm .Deborah Grover .A.J. Simmons .Angela Moore .Nathan D. Simmons . Reid Price( Tom ) . Paul Zinno( Nathan ) . Vox Smith( Boy in White ) . Cynthia Jimenez-Hicks( Trudy ) . Katerina Bakolias( Colony House Resident ) . Cliff Saunders( Dale ) . Bob Mann( Frank Pratt ) . Colby Conrad( Tobey McCray ) . Simon Sinn( Bing-Qian Liu ) . Lisa Ryder( Abby Stevens ) . Christopher Hayes( Kevin ) . Stevey Hunter( Sentry ) . Molly Dunsworth( Beautiful Young Woman ) . Stephane Gaudet( Colony House Resident ) . Jessica Barry( Gina ) . Sara Campbell( Creature #1 (Old Lady) ) . Jamie McGuire( Smiley Creature ) . John MacNeil( Mechanic Creature ) . Sam Vigneault( Eric ) . Dylan Bailey( Civil War Soldier ) . Eli Arsenault( Young Victor ) . Stephanie Clervi( Woman ) . Jaimara Beals( Townsperson ) . Bella Martin( Meagan Pratt ) . David Christoffel( Eli ) . Becca Babcock( Townsperson #1 ) . Ann Doyle( Lauren Pratt ) . Leah Pritchard( Stacey ) . Benjamin/ep Clost( Guard #1 ) . Sam Haynes( Creature #2 (Jock) ) . Anthony L. Jackson( Nurse ) . Janna MacDonald( Colony House Resident (uncredited) )

Language English.

Producers Josh Appelbaum. Jack Bender. Lindsay Dunn. Adrienne Erickson. John Griffin. Mike Larocca. Tom Luse. Michael Mahoney. AndrÃ© Nemec. Jeff Pinkner. Scott Rosenberg. Anthony Russo. Joe Russo. Nancy Cotton. Michael Wright. Rola Bauer. Javier Grillo-Marxuach.

Production AGBO. Epix Studios. MGM International TV Productions.

 

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 20

Status OnGoing (2022–)
